TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are now terrified of all the other planets.

I wish for infinite witches.

Granted, you conquer the world and rule it for one brief second.

I wish I would get out of the Kerbin system.

Granted, you float out into solar orbit doomed to be trapped forever on a solar escape trajectory.

I wish i could make Youtube videos.

Granted. They're just ugly pictures.

I wish for 7 starch-orbs to appear above me between 8:12 and 8:18, as well as between 16:50 and 16:54.

granted but they appeared on an other time stream than the ones your located in, so you missed them

i wish i do not edit most of my posts

I reveal that it's actually a frog.

I wish for the stars to drop trash onto Earth.

Granted. Ecologists hate you and a piece of trash crushes you.

I wish for humans to make a moon base.

Granted. A huge asteroid hits the base. They blame you.

I wish updates where faster for KSP .

Granted. your computer overloads and explodes from all of the speed.

I wish I could create a paradox.

Granted. A time machine appears in front of you at the time this wish is granted. After killing the Wishmaking Fairy AND yourself, a time machine appears in front of you.

I wish for 7 orbs of physics violation.

Granted. The Physics Police arrest you.

I wish for a better film editing program.

Granted, but it always crashes every 5 minutes.

I wish Alaska was not super hot.

Granted. Giant penguins that breathe ice live in Alaska now. The entire world freezes.

I wish for a phone.

Granted. The number has been given to every telemarketer on Earth, the ringer can't be silenced or turned down from maximum volume, and it's a Nokia N-gage.

I wish for more vacation time.

Granted, but you're stuck in the middle of nowhere because your car broke. Towing service arrives a few hours before your vacation time is over.

I wish music was my native language.

Granted, but you only play the drums.

I wish for KSP super-size jets to cost 20 funds each, not including fuel.

Granted, but they are so bad they break apart with just a small push.

I wish for a tiny rocket the size of a cell.

Granted, but it's stuck inside your brain, destroying your cells one at a time.

I wish for a miniature miniature.

Granted. You receive a Tool Gun, which has only 1 use and can only make things 0.95 ^ 2 the size they are.

I wish for multiply by 5.

Granted. You go bankrupt trying to feed and clothe your five children.

I wish for more wisdom.

Granted, +.0000000001 wisdom added to teeth.

I wish for a pink iron crown.

Grantd, but you are trapped by it (size unspecified).

I wish for 1.0 something.

Granted, You now have 1 brain cell.

I wish to become a timelord

Granted, but your lifespan is 2x as short as an average human's.

I wish I could get PlanetFactory to work.
